Text:
Audio is out of sync. Otherwise quality is very good.

Video : 8
Audio : 8

Any idea how to correct.
mag2004: use the VLC player.  There is an option in the extended settings to adjust the sound to sync up.  With this one, + 0.03 seconds is perfect :)

Come on Guys ! 
2 years later, and no seeders !!!! Come on !
